short_summary: Planning, design, organization, and production of a pyrotechnics show on July 1st for the Canada Day celebration.
description: The Department of Canadian Heritage requires the services for the planning, designing, organizing and producing of a pyrotechnics show on July 1st, for the Canada Day celebration in the National Capital Region. The period of the contract is for one year with the option of extending the contract for a one-year option period.
full_summary:
# Canada Day Fireworks [Pyrotechnics Services]

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: 10222350
* **Publication Date**: January 19, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 28, 2023, at 14:00 hours
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Currency**: Not specified

## Service Details

* **Description**: The Department of Canadian Heritage requires the services of a pyrotechnics company to plan, design, organize, and produce a fireworks show on July 1st for the Canada Day celebration in the National Capital Region.
* **Duration**: The contract is for a period of one year, with an option for an additional one-year extension.

## Supporting Documentation

* Download the [English] [French] bid package from [Canada Buy Service](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/10222350_rfp_en.pdf) / [Canada Buy Service](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/10222350_dpp_fr.pdf)
* Download the [English] [French] amendment [1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/25/ee515c53c7549d3edc0b64ac93d43912/10222350_rfp_amendment_1_bilingue.pdf)

## Eligibility and Selection Criteria

* **Competition Type**: Open bidding
* **GSIN Classification**: PYROTECHNICS - PRODUCTION DESIGN (JD1370)
* **Trade Agreements**: Eligible vendors must comply with the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Canadian Heritage
* **Address**: 1030 Innes Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1B4S7, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Nicole Sabourin
* **Email**: contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca
* **Phone**: None
* **Fax**: None
* **Region of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Region of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Country**: Canada
